website_summaries.verdict: Ideal tool for general math, algebra, and the sciences. Offers excellent value for money.
pros: Multiple calculations can be displayed on one screen
Hit the toggle key to view fractions and decimals in alternate forms
The scroll up function lets you view previous equations
Meets requirements for standardized tests that don't allow graphing calculators
cons: The battery doesn't hold a charge as well as we'd like

customer_reviews.title: now we have three calculators like this - a pink
customer_reviews.text: OK, now we have three calculators like this - a pink, a teal, and this one. Don't ask... Anyway, the color is bright and the calculator is a really nice and affordable one, easy to use and with a four-line display that lets you review your work.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: My son needednthisnfor math class. Arrivednon time and works great. He said he was glad that I purchased a colored one so his stands.out from his classmates.
customer_reviews.author: Desmarie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This calculator has been a lifeline! I admit I was a little bummed, that I could not find it in the pink color I really wanted, but overall this is a great calculator. Easy to use, easy to clean, its tough & durable. Overall great purchase, I will & have recommended to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Rice

customer_reviews.title: this is a good one. It's green
customer_reviews.text: I am forced to use this calculator for exams. But as far as calculators go, this is a good one. It's green, which means that I'll stand out amongst all the other nerds in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.text: Still got it after 3 years, still use it, and still refur to it as my leap frog calculator Ps good for exams and college classes because it's not graphing or programmable so more professors allow it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good calculator, but not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This calculator is really good. Not exactly easy to use but comes with a user guide. I had to be taught different shortcuts to use it. It’s great for taking GED test which is what I used it for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's so good I feel like i'm cheating when I use it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for going back to school. It's so good I feel like i'm cheating when I use it lol
customer_reviews.author: Boss La Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Right for students!
customer_reviews.text: I am pursuing graduate studies in Statistics and bought this for my coursework and exams. The product is very very light and works really well. If you are a student that needs a calculator, don't look anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Neha Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the color. Seems to work great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Candace knight

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Calculator is different color from what the other students have in school.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Altman

customer_reviews.title: Just as Described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Math Class I teach. Love the color and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hendren

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective
customer_reviews.text: Needed a cheap but decent calculator for some mathematics classes, and this one fits the bill!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for college statistics.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for my statistics class. Works great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stenkamp

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I found online calculators easier to use than this. Nicely made, not user friendly
customer_reviews.author: Nursie2335

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as the more expensive ones. Love mine!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Rivera

customer_reviews.title: ... I've had in the past (placement-wise) but it's a nice calculator and it does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: The buttons are different from any TI calculator I've had in the past (placement-wise) but it's a nice calculator and it does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Paul

customer_reviews.title: I liked it so much that I bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use. It got me through physics!! I liked it so much that I bought 2, if I would have bought one the night before an exam there wouldn't have been time to replace it. Watched people struggle with their more expensive calculators all semester.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hartshorne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality calculator. Does everything my middle schooler needs it to!

customer_reviews.title: It is a wonderful tool!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dyslexic student, so he could see the problem he was inputting. It is a wonderful tool!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great calculator, but I'm still bad at math.

customer_reviews.title: Helping with pre cal
customer_reviews.text: This is a good calculator for my pre cal class. I think it is helping me a lot. It does fractions when my other one did not.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect for using for the actuarial exams I have to pass. This is the 2nd of these calculators I have purchased, use as a backup on the exams. Love the multiple line and data/table feature on this one.

product_meta.title: Texas Instruments TI30XSMVLIMEGRN Calculator
product_meta.description: Powerful, four-line scientific calculator for high school math and science exploration. Ti's 4-line scientific with more advanced features. View multiple calculations and answers as you would write it on paper. Easily scroll, review and edit current or previous entries. New features include function table and data/list Editor.
feature_bullets: Review and edit previous entries via a scrollable home screen
random number and random integer generator
Functions accessed directly through keys or through pull-down menus

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars102 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
